fields.summary: Smart, inclusive, and usable products to make your life a little better.
fields.title: Apps that don't suck.

children.value:
import { Button, Heading, Paragraph, Strong, useTheme, metadata } from '@octopusthink/nautilus'
import React from 'react'
import { css } from '@emotion/core'

import AppCard from 'components/AppCard'
import ButtonInverse from 'components/ButtonInverse'
import BlogPostCards from 'components/BlogPostCards'
import FriendLogos from 'components/FriendLogos'
import GridSpanner from 'components/GridSpanner'
import Hide from 'components/Hide'
import IllustratedPoint from 'components/IllustratedPoint'
import Image from 'components/Image'
import Panel from 'components/Panel'
import PortfolioCards from 'components/PortfolioCards'
import TestimonialCarousel from 'components/TestimonialCarousel'

<Panel gridTablet="1fr 1fr">
  <GridSpanner>
    <Heading level={2}>Our Apps</Heading>
  </GridSpanner>

<AppCard
  type="Mac"
  heading="Mic Drop"
  image="/images/portfolio/mic-drop/mic-drop-title.png"
  alt="An illustration of a computer screen showing a meeting between emoji animals."
  link="https://getmicdrop.com/?pk_campaign=octopusthink&pk_kwd=apps"
  linkText="Try Mic Drop"
>
Mute your mic in any app.
A macOS menu bar app that allows you to quickly mute and unmute yourself using a customisable keyboard shortcut.
</AppCard>

<AppCard
  type="Windows & Mac"
  heading="Turnip"
  image="/images/portfolio/turnip/turnip-title.png"
  alt="Two screens overlaid: one showing a list of timers, and the other showing some statistics about how you spend your time."
  link="https://turniptimer.com/?pk_campaign=octopusthink&pk_kwd=apps"
  linkText="Join the Turnip beta"
  beta
>
Time tracking for freelancers.
A simple timer for your menubar or system tray. Integrates with popular accounting services.

</AppCard>
</Panel>

<Panel dark gridDesktop="1fr 1fr">
  <GridSpanner>
    <Heading inverse level={2}>What we're up to now</Heading>
  </GridSpanner>
<BlogPostCards number={2} />

<GridSpanner>
  <ButtonInverse noMargin navigation minimal to="/blog/">
    Read our blog
  </ButtonInverse>
</GridSpanner>
</Panel>
<Panel gridTablet="auto 24rem" gridDesktop="auto 40rem">
<div>
Who we are 👋
We're a pair of cephalopod-loving humans based in Scotland 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿 and Portugal 🇵🇹 who also happen to love building stuff.
Sarah is our Chief Design Octopus, a designer with a penchant for bold colours and impractical footwear. 👠
Matt is our Chief Technical Octopus, a developer convinced that Vespas are more practical than cars. 🛵

<Button noMargin minimal navigation to="/about/">
  Read all about us
</Button>

<Image
  src="sarah-and-matt.jpg"
  alt="Sarah and Matt surrounded by stuffed octopuses."
  css={css`
    border-radius: 100%;
    box-shadow: 0px 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.125);
    max-height: 40rem;
    max-width: 40rem;
    @media screen and (min-width: 640px) and (max-width: 1023px) {
      align-self: center;
      max-height: 24rem;
      max-width: 24rem;
    }
  `}
/>
</Panel>

export const _frontmatter = {"title":"Apps that don't suck.","summary":"Smart, inclusive, and usable products to make your life a little better.\n","description":"Octopus Think is a design & technology company based in Scotland and Portugal. We specialise in accessible, inclusive design, smart React development, and beautiful, functional apps.","component":"PageWithoutPageBody"}

page.rawBody:
--- title: Apps that don't suck. summary: | Smart, inclusive, and usable products to make your life a little better. description: Octopus Think is a design & technology company based in Scotland and Portugal. We specialise in accessible, inclusive design, smart React development, and beautiful, functional apps. component: PageWithoutPageBody --- import { Button, Heading, Paragraph, Strong, useTheme, metadata } from '@octopusthink/nautilus' import React from 'react' import { css } from '@emotion/core' import AppCard from 'components/AppCard' import ButtonInverse from 'components/ButtonInverse' import BlogPostCards from 'components/BlogPostCards' import FriendLogos from 'components/FriendLogos' import GridSpanner from 'components/GridSpanner' import Hide from 'components/Hide' import IllustratedPoint from 'components/IllustratedPoint' import Image from 'components/Image' import Panel from 'components/Panel' import PortfolioCards from 'components/PortfolioCards' import TestimonialCarousel from 'components/TestimonialCarousel' Our Apps **Mute your mic in any app.** A macOS menu bar app that allows you to quickly mute and unmute yourself using a customisable keyboard shortcut. **Time tracking for freelancers.** A simple timer for your menubar or system tray. Integrates with popular accounting services. What we're up to now Read our blog
## Who we are 👋 We're a pair of cephalopod-loving humans based in Scotland 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿 and Portugal 🇵🇹 who also happen to love building stuff. Sarah is our Chief Design Octopus, a designer with a penchant for bold colours and impractical footwear. 👠 Matt is our Chief Technical Octopus, a developer convinced that Vespas are more practical than cars. 🛵
